document.full_text: germany's der spiegel magazine published pictures monday of american troops posing over the bloodied body of a man it said had been killed illegally in afghanistan, drawing an apology from the u.s. army.
document.title: u.s. army apologizes over "repugnant" afghan photos
lines_and_colors: germany's der spiegel magazine published pictures monday of american troops posing over the bloodied body of a man it said had been killed illegally in afghanistan, drawing an apology from the u.s. army.
